comments.text:
uptake REST API reports only platforms which have data, but IMHO should report all available platforms. The platforms without any data should be reported as if they have 0 uptake.

At the moment I get the following response, even though there are other platforms available for this product.

<mirror_uptake>
<item>
<available>234</available>
<product>Firefox-4.0b9-Partial-4.0b8</product>
<total>102825</total>
<os>linux</os>
</item>
</mirror_uptake>
comments.creator: rail@mozilla.com
